mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) FROM ma900020 WHERE ISDELETE = '0'
AND LICENSENAME LIKE '%'+#{licensename}+'%'
SELECT A.LICENSENO ,A.LICENSENAME ,A.LICENSECOST ,CASE WHEN A.ISDELETE = 0 THEN '사용' WHEN A.ISDELETE = 1 THEN '미사용' END AS ISDELETE_ FROM ma900020 A WHERE A.LICENSENO = #{licenseno}

SELECT TOP 20 A.LICENSENAME ,A.LICENSECOST ,B.BUYCNT ,CONVERT(nvarchar,DATEADD(year,1,C.FREGDATE),23) AS LASTDATE FROM ma900020 A INNER JOIN me810010 B ON B.LICENSENO = A.LICENSENO INNER JOIN ma900010 C ON C.SITEID = B.SITEID WHERE B.SITEID = #{siteid}

SELECT A.LICENSENO ,A.LICENSENAME ,A.LICENSECOST ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM me810010 WHERE LICENSENO = A.LICENSENO GROUP BY LICENSENO) AS TOTALCNT ,CONVERT(nvarchar,A.REGDATE,23) AS REGDATE ,(SELECT USERNAME FROM me800010 WHERE USERNO = A.REGUSER) AS REGUSER_ ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.LICENSENO DESC) AS ROWNUM FROM ma900020 A WHERE ISDELETE = '0'
